title: Legend of the Poro King - need 16 champions available??? (newbie question)
body:
So still fairly new here.  Sorry if this is obvious XD

Just reached level 10.  When I try and queue for Poro King, it tells me it fails "Because you did not meet the required game play criteria, you are unable to join the queue.   YOu must have at least 16 champions available"

Does this mean I need to buy/unlock 16 champions?
=/

replies.body:
Whilst free champs count, you need to think about how many champions are free and which of those you may own if the rotation changes.

Best to just get 16 champs of your own otherwise you may be able to play one week and not the next.

> Does this mean I need to buy/unlock 16 champions?

Yep. Though I'm not sure if the Poro King mode counts free rotation champs as well or if it's like ranked and doesn't count free rotation champs. I think it does count free rotation champs, though you'd be better off asking a Rioter.
Free Champs count on Poro king
